mapper.select: select a.data_date_key as dateTime, a.device_name as typeInfo, a.total_energy as totalEnergy, a.cusp_time_energy as cuspTimeEnergy, a.peak_time_energy as peakTimeEnergy, a.fair_time_energy as fairTimeEnergy, a.valley_time_energy as valleyTimeEnergy from ems_time_share_power_consumption_statistics a where a.corp_code = #{corpCode} and a.device_id = #{deviceId} and a.data_date_key BETWEEN #{qryStartTime} and #{qryEndTime} and a.data_type = #{dataType} order by a.data_date_key desc
